text: I have this hooked to a Sears Shop Wet/Dry Vacuum.  As others have noted, the attachment size is a little "non-standard", probably due to the fact that the hose fits over the tools instead of sliding in them.  Nonetheless, the hose and swivel are easy to use and the material makes for very efficient pickup.  I also like the claw and crevice nozzle.  They are a bit small for small spaces in my small car, but they are great for going over floors, seats, and jobsite pickup.  Definitely recommended over the stock hose that comes with most shop & wet/dry vacs.

Sturdy with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt.Understand you will need to prep this before use. The sole is not precision ground but machine rough, so you will need a granite block and sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once you have your sole (and sides) honed and flat you will need to sharpen the blade. There are several jigs and sharpening tools to assist in this. After all is done apply an anti-rust agent such as wood wax or Boeshield.Once prep'd this is a great plane.

I picked this game up at a store because it was on sale.  Got home and read reviews...almost returned it.  Glad I didn't because it actually works very well for my kids.  My daughter (4) and son (2 1/2) both love it and can always make a "basket" within about 4 tries.  My kids were actually better at it than my husband and myself!  Granted, we have to center the doggy for them so they're lined up to flip the ants, but I don't mind that.  Definitely wasn't too difficult for them.

I purchased this game to be used during a trip with my granddaughters ages 6 and 8.  They loved the game so much that one of them asked that I purchase another one just for them for their birthday.  It is a great tool to assist them in broadening their vocabulary and spelling skills while enjoying the competition of a game. It is easy to play and understand.  Melissa and Doug have designed a visibly appealing and durable product with all parts attached to the one board eliminating the chance of losing pieces.

If you have not already noticed, Diablo is easily located within Dungeons and Dragons. This is actually a benefit for Diablo, since it has very little story going on. This RPG/action hybrid is nice and it's multiplayer community is huge. Too bad there are millions of cheaters. Just be legit and everyone else will catch on. The game offers lots of fun. Not many complaints though. They are really your choice as to if they're bad or good. Get the game if you want. Not a wasted "money".

Dino Crisis is a great game -- lots of excitement, suspense, and action.  It doesn't fail there.  I beat it in four days (seven hours playing time), though, so definitely rent it first.Some of the voice acting is weak,  but it's not the worst out there.  The story will keep you interested, as  will the battles with the enemy dinosaurs.  An added plus is the decisions  you must make at key points in the story, but even this (and the different  costumes) isn't enough to give the game the replay value it needs to make  it a 5-star game.
The Sears Shop Wet/Dry Vacuum is connected to this.
As mentioned by others, the attachment size is not standard, most likely because the hose fits over the tools instead of sliding in.
However, the hose and swivel are user-friendly and the material used ensures efficient pickup.
I particularly enjoy using the claw and crevice nozzle.
Although the claw and crevice nozzle may be too small for tight spaces in my small car, they are excellent for cleaning floors, seats, and picking up debris on the jobsite.
I highly recommend using this attachment instead of the generic hose that typically comes with most shop & wet/dry vacuums.
This plane is sturdy and comes with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt. Before using it, it is important to understand that you will need to prepare it.
Prior to using, it is necessary to prep this plane, which has a sturdy build and an adjustable mouth and blade tilt.

The sole of this plane is not precision ground, but instead machine rough. To rectify this, you will require a granite block and sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once you have honed and flattened both the sole and sides, it's time to sharpen the blade.
To achieve the best results with this plane, which boasts a sturdy construction and an adjustable mouth and blade tilt, you need to prepare it beforehand.

You will need to prepare this plane before use, as it has a solid structure with an adjustable mouth and blade tilt. The sole is not precision ground, but rather machine rough, necessitating the use of a granite block and sandpaper or a set of flat block diamond hones. Once you have honed and flattened the sole (and sides), the next step is to sharpen the blade.
Once properly prepped, this plane becomes an excellent tool. Its sturdiness, adjustable mouth, and blade tilt make it highly versatile and efficient.
Due to its discounted price, I decided to purchase this game from a store. However, upon reading reviews after arriving home, I almost contemplated returning it.

Thankfully, I changed my mind about returning the game because it has proven to be highly suitable for my children. It works exceptionally well and my 4-year-old daughter and 2 1/2-year-old son both adore it.
Surprisingly, my kids have surpassed both my husband and myself in their skill at the game. They can consistently make a "basket" within just four attempts.
While we do need to assist them in positioning the doggy properly to flip the ants, I don't mind doing so. It was not excessively challenging for them.
Not only did my kids enjoy the game, but they also excelled at it. They outperformed both my husband and me, which was unexpected.
Although we have to help our kids align the doggy for optimal ant flipping, it's a task I willingly undertake. The game did not present undue difficulty for them.

Diablo can be easily found within Dungeons and Dragons in case you haven't noticed yet. This turns out to be advantageous for Diablo as it lacks a substantial storyline.
The existence of Diablo within Dungeons and Dragons is a clear observation to make. Fortunately for Diablo, its limited narrative doesn't pose a problem.

Diablo, an RPG/action hybrid, benefits greatly from its association with Dungeons and Dragons. Additionally, its multiplayer community is quite extensive, although it's unfortunate that there are numerous cheaters among them.
If you want to enjoy Diablo, it's best to refrain from cheating and play the game legitimately. The vast majority of players will eventually recognize and appreciate this.

One of the appealing aspects of Diablo is the abundance of fun it offers. Although there are a few complaints, they ultimately depend on personal preference as to whether they are perceived as negative or positive.
If you are interested, consider getting the game as it will not be a wasted investment of your money.

Dino Crisis offers a thrilling gameplay experience with an abundance of excitement, suspense, and action. Its entertainment value does not disappoint. Despite completing the game in just four days, with a playing time of seven hours, it is advisable to rent it before making a purchase.

While some of the voice acting in Dino Crisis is subpar, it is not the worst compared to other games. The engaging storyline and intense battles with enemy dinosaurs guarantee to keep players captivated. Additionally, the inclusion of decision-making moments and different costumes adds an extra layer of enjoyment. However, even with these features, the game lacks the replay value necessary to earn a 5-star rating.

Dino Crisis surpasses expectations as a fantastic game filled with excitement, suspense, and non-stop action. It doesn't falter in those aspects. Although I managed to complete it in just four days, with a total of seven hours of gameplay, I highly recommend renting it first to assess its worth.

While Dino Crisis showcases weak voice acting in certain parts, it is not the worst offenders in the gaming world. The game's enthralling storyline, combined with exhilarating battles against dinosaur enemies, will undoubtedly keep players engaged. Another positive aspect is the inclusion of decision-making moments and the ability to unlock different costumes. However, even with these features, the game lacks the necessary replay value to be considered a 5-star game.

Dino Crisis, a remarkable game overflowing with excitement, suspense, and intense action, delivers on its promises. I managed to beat the game in a mere four days, spending seven hours playing, but I recommend renting it first for a trial run.

While some of the voice acting in Dino Crisis falls short, it is by no means the worst in the gaming sphere. The intriguing story and thrilling dinosaur battles will keep players interested throughout. Additionally, the inclusion of pivotal decision-making moments and unlockable costumes add to the game's appeal. Nevertheless, these elements alone do not provide the necessary replay value to elevate it to a 5-star rating.
